name: Duck 2023
description:
Duck DESCRIPTION In each level, graves will reveal dead ducks (& occasional agents). At the beginning of each level, the portal will bring you to the store. With every dead duck that is brought over to any green Sell Spot, The player will gain $5 — that can be spent in the store to buy powerups. Each level is completed by finding the other portal at a different corner of the map.
    CONTROLS

  • WASD (movement)
  • Mouse (flashlight)
  • Right Click (interacts with graves and skeletons)
  • F (toggles flashlight)
  • Left Click (weapon fire)
      • ROLES

  • Peleg ZM: Art & Sound Design Lead
  • Josh V: Game Design Lead & Producer
  • Riley C: Game Director & Tech Lead
